Name: PANKAJ
Reviews: Zomato's delivery service is atrocious. Orders are consistently late, sometimes arriving cold or even missing items altogether. Delivery drivers seem to have no regard for timeliness or customer satisfaction, often providing flimsy excuses for their tardiness. Customer support is virtually useless, offering nothing but empty apologies and no real solutions. It's frustrating to rely on a service that consistently fails to deliver on its promises. Worst app.
